seo.title: Break Even ROAS Calculator - Free Online ROAS Calculator
seo.description: Free Break Even ROAS calculator to determine if your Facebook, TikTok, or Snapchat ads are profitable. Calculate your break-even point with VAT support.
seo.keywords: break even roas calculator, roas calculator, facebook ads calculator, tiktok ads calculator, snapchat ads calculator, advertising roi calculator

header.title: Break Even ROAS Calculator
header.description: Calculate your Break Even ROAS to determine if your Facebook, TikTok, or Snapchat ads are profitable. Includes VAT calculations for accurate results.

calculator.title: Break Even ROAS Calculator
calculator.description: Enter your costs and revenue to calculate your break-even ROAS and profit analysis

howToUse.title: How to Use the Break Even ROAS Calculator

inputFields.title: Input Fields
items: Enter all your costs per product (Cost of Goods, Shipping, Transaction, Other)
Select the appropriate VAT rate for each cost category
Select the VAT rate for your revenue
The calculator will automatically calculate your break-even ROAS

items.description: ROAS = Total Revenue / (Total Revenue - Total Costs)
Net amounts are calculated by removing VAT from gross amounts
Profit margin and net profit per product are calculated automatically

tips.title: Tips for Accurate Results
items: Include all costs associated with your product
Use the correct VAT rates for your region
Enter revenue before any platform fees
Consider all transaction costs (payment processing, etc.)
Update calculations when costs or prices change

formula.title: Break Even ROAS Formula
formula.description: The Break Even ROAS is calculated by dividing total revenue by the difference between total revenue and total costs. This gives you the ROAS value at which your campaign breaks even.

interpretation.title: ROAS Interpretation
interpretation.description: ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) measures how much revenue you earn for every dollar spent on advertising. A ROAS of 1 means you break even, while higher values indicate profit and lower values indicate losses.

importance.title: Why Break Even ROAS is Important
importance.description: Knowing your break-even ROAS helps you determine if your advertising campaigns are profitable. You can compare this to your actual ROAS in Facebook, TikTok, or Snapchat to make informed decisions about campaign optimization.
